examples: The blood regurgitates into the heart ventricle

definitions.text: feed through the beak by regurgitating previously swallowed food
examples: many birds feed their young by regurgitating what they have swallowed and carried to the nest
For the exam, you must be able to regurgitate the information

definitions.text: eject the contents of the stomach through the mouth
examples: After drinking too much, the students vomited
The patient regurgitated the food we gave him last night
